title: Running LoL @ 4K, anyway to mod health bars to be bigger
body:
I recently got a 4K monitor and tried to play a ranked game and straight up the health bars for the champions and minions were microscopic, I was missing last hits like crazy and i was lucky i was only playing support for that game. Are there any hot-fix to make them bigger (like editing some .ini or .xml files) or are mod or add-on that will fix this??

The reason I don't want to change the resolution is because I need to use borderless mode to get the LSI overlay working. I know if i go fullscreen and run it at 1080p it will be fine.

replies.body:
I don't think it's possible to make them any bigger than it is, or maybe it's still possible but editing the game file might be a little dangerous since you won't know if Riot counts that as illegal.

So I guess for LoL you need to tune down your resolution to play properly, kinda sucks.
you are allowed to mod league, just not with anything that gives an unfair advantage. UI mods are fine. When I do play at a lower resolution with borderless this happens: http://imgur.com/OOi6FfI
